Package org.apache.james.postage.smtpserver

Class Summary
AvalonToPostageLogger adapter to redirect log avalon messages to commons-logging
SimpleMailServer a quite simple (only receiving) SMTP server which reads mails and tries to match them with sent test mails.
SimpleServiceManager mock-up of ServiceManager
SimpleSMTPServerConfiguration  
SMTPMailAnalyzeStrategy  
SMTPMailSink puts up a gateway SMTP server acting as a mail sink for the external mail sent out by James.
TrivialMailContext mock-up of MailetContext
